member.name: T:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Audio.DrumSampleContainer
member.summary: Stores samples for the input drum. The lifetime of the samples is adjusted so that they are only alive during the appropriate sample control point.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Beatmaps.TaikoBeatmapConverter.LEGACY_VELOCITY_MULTIPLIER
member.summary: osu! is generally slower than taiko, so a factor is added to increase speed. This must be used everywhere slider length or beat length is used.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Beatmaps.TaikoBeatmapConverter.swell_hit_multiplier
member.summary: Because swells are easier in taiko than spinners are in osu!, legacy taiko multiplies a factor when converting the number of required hits.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Beatmaps.TaikoBeatmapConverter.osu_base_scoring_distance
member.summary: Base osu! slider scoring distance.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Beatmaps.TaikoBeatmapConverter.taiko_base_distance
member.summary: Drum roll distance that results in a duration of 1 speed-adjusted beat length.

member.name: T:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Preprocessing.StaminaCheeseDetector
member.summary: Detects special hit object patterns which are easier to hit using special techniques than normally assumed in the fully-alternating play style.
member.remarks:
This component detects two basic types of patterns, leveraged by the following techniques:
Rolling allows hitting patterns with quickly and regularly alternating notes with a single hand.
TL tapping makes hitting longer sequences of consecutive same-colour notes with little to no colour changes in-between.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Preprocessing.StaminaCheeseDetector.roll_min_repetitions
member.summary: The minimum number of consecutive objects with repeating patterns that can be classified as hittable using a roll.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Preprocessing.StaminaCheeseDetector.tl_min_repetitions
member.summary: The minimum number of consecutive objects with repeating patterns that can be classified as hittable using a TL tap.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Preprocessing.StaminaCheeseDetector.hitObjects
member.summary: The list of all s in the map.

member.name: M:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Preprocessing.StaminaCheeseDetector.FindCheese
member.summary: Finds and marks all objects in that special difficulty-reducing techiques apply to with the flag.

member.name: M:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Preprocessing.StaminaCheeseDetector.findRolls(System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds and marks all sequences hittable using a roll.
member.param: The length of a single repeating pattern to consider (triplets/quadruplets).

The type of hit to check for TL taps.

The gameplay preceding .
The gameplay preceding .
The rate of the gameplay clock. Modified by speed-changing mods.
The index of the object in the beatmap.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Preprocessing.TaikoDifficultyHitObject.common_rhythms
member.summary: List of most common rhythm changes in taiko maps.
member.remarks:
The general guidelines for the values are:
rhythm changes with ratio closer to 1 (that are not 1) are harder to play,
speeding up is generally harder than slowing down (with exceptions of rhythm changes requiring a hand switch).

member.summary: Calculates the stamina coefficient of taiko difficulty.
member.remarks: The reference play style chosen uses two hands, with full alternating (the hand changes after every hit).

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Skills.Stamina.max_history_length
member.summary: Maximum number of entries to keep in .

member.name: F:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Skills.Stamina.hand
member.summary: The index of the hand this instance is associated with.
member.remarks: The value of 0 indicates the left hand (full alternating gameplay starting with left hand is assumed). This naturally translates onto index offsets of the objects in the map.

member.summary: Stores the last durations between notes hit with the hand indicated by .

member.summary: Stores the of the last object that was hit by the other hand.

member.name: M:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.Skills.Stamina.speedBonus(System.Double)
member.summary: Applies a speed bonus dependent on the time since the last hit performed using this hand.
member.param: The duration between the current and previous note hit using the hand indicated by .

member.name: M:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.TaikoDifficultyCalculator.simpleColourPenalty(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the penalty for the stamina skill for maps with low colour difficulty.
member.remarks: Some maps (especially converts) can be easy to read despite a high note density. This penalty aims to reduce the star rating of such maps by factoring in colour difficulty to the stamina skill.

member.name: M:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.TaikoDifficultyCalculator.norm(System.Double,System.Double[])
member.summary: Returns the p-norm of an n-dimensional vector.
member.param: The value of p to calculate the norm for.
The coefficients of the vector.

member.summary: Returns the partial star rating of the beatmap, calculated using peak strains from all sections of the map.
member.remarks: For each section, the peak strains of all separate skills are combined into a single peak strain for the section. The resulting partial rating of the beatmap is a weighted sum of the combined peaks (higher peaks are weighted more).

member.name: M:osu.Game.Rulesets.Taiko.Difficulty.TaikoDifficultyCalculator.rescale(System.Double)
member.summary: Applies a final re-scaling of the star rating to bring maps with recorded full combos below 9.5 stars.
member.param: The raw star rating value before re-scaling.
